channel.title: ::vote help! Small error
channel.description: Hey guys, i get an error when i run my server, the server works its just the GTLVote that doesn't. I don't know why not as i followed the tutorial. I know someone can help so please guys help me:) I can user TV with anyone willing to resolve this issue:)

item.title: ::vote help! Small error
item.dc:creator: @Mikey96 Mikey96
item.description:
@Mikey96 wrote:

Yeah, sk8ter that is the problem, i was using x10hosting (free). I bought trentahost webhosting and going t see if it works thanks guys.

item.title: ::vote help! Small error
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Mikey96:

Any idea how to fix?

Create a mySQL database, if your webhost doesn’t offer that you should change. You also need php. Let it connect to your mySQL then. For more precise answers: Google. Easy to find.

Read full topic

item.title: ::vote help! Small error
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Mikey96:

Hey guys, i get an error when i run my server, the server works its just the GTLVote that doesn’t. I don’t know why not as i followed the tutorial. I know someone can help so please guys help me:) I can user TV with anyone willing to resolve this issue:)

I don’t understand what you mean,

You get an error when running the server, but the server works it’s just the GTLVote which doesn’t work?

Show some code? What does the compiler throws out for errors? Is the Error occuring while the server starts up? I can’t help you without one of these info’s.

Read full topic
